name: suite-key
effect: Opens the locked building in the lakeside resort.
short_effect: Opens a locked building in the Lakeside Resort.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A key to one of the suites at the
luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd
reason, it often disappears.
